content.title: HIV-Associated Vasculopathy
content.description: Spectrum of vascular pathology in HIV patients including accelerated atherosclerosis, aneurysms, and arteritis.

pathophysiology.haart_contribution: Protease inhibitors associated with metabolic syndrome and accelerated atherosclerosis

treatment.medical: Optimize HAART, cardiovascular risk factor modification
treatment.surgical: Standard approaches; autogenous conduit preferred due to infection risk

content.clinical_pearl: HIV patients on HAART have increased cardiovascular risk; treat aggressively like other high-risk populations
content.statement: HIV-Associated Vasculopathy is a fundamental concept in Health-Sciences Medicine Surgery Vascular Pathology Rare-Syndromes that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.
